item.description:
Boston loves its beer. 

This group is dedicated to the stalwart enthusiasts of beer. Namely craft beer, American or otherwise.

Members can be seasoned advocates or newly devoted fans. Events will revolve around meeting others who like to drink, talk about and share their love of beer. With so many great bars and festivals in Boston, the possibilities of meeting up are endless. 

What makes this group so unique? You, of course! And secondly, the places we go. From top-notch beer bars to annual festivals, this is a group designed solely to please and inspire Boston's beer buffs.

So, join; any friend of beer is a friend of mine.


Cheers!
item.name: The Craft Beer Crew
